column4: Hello!! On boot, after the BIOS loads, when the screen is all black but the blinking cursor at the top left, but before GRUB loads, what is that screen called? Because my computer is not going past that screen and I don't know what to google for this :)
that screen is called the POST (Bios checks)
np, such an easy question was no trouble at all to answer, I 've fiddled with computers for 25 years now, so I can claim some experience there...
